taskdescription:
Synopsis:  Perform DNS Query and get a result back.\
\
Input param:  host\
Input value expected:  FQDN or IP address\
\
Output param:  status\
Output values:  IP: <IP address>, Name:<FQDN>, QUERY FAILED!\
\
Sample Params Config (fill in over on the left): \
{\
"host":"10.23.16.193"\
}
